summary: The document outlines a stepwise research plan to produce a comprehensive report on SAP SuccessFactors Work Zone and its new home page quick actions, covering platform fundamentals, prior quick actions, detailed descriptions of ten new quick actions, technical integration, user impact, best practices, comparisons, deployment challenges, KPIs, and adoption guidance. Initial findings describe Work Zone as a personalized, integrated digital workplace that enhances productivity (unified workspace, guided experiences, communications, extensibility) and begin detailing new quick actions such as document access, time-off requests, expense submission, approvals, learning recommendations, team metrics, internal job postings, and IT support.
